short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps to track wins/loses/ties/KDA stats after rank change on csgostats.gg

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension allows you to predict your rank change based on latest matches result, also it includes data for previous ranks.

Important:
Results are built based on csgostats.gg data, so its valid only if match tracking was enabled

How to use:
1. Install the extension
1. Open https://csgostats.gg and log in
2. Open account settings (https://csgostats.gg/user) and enable match tracking
3. Open matches tab on the left navigation bar

How does it count results:
1. Win +1 to result 'win' score
2. Lose -1 to result 'win' score
3. Tie +1 to result 'tie' score
4. Rank up/Rank down matches are not included to 'latest rank' stats
